app.name: Zendesk Organization Management Extension
app.description: An integration for managing Zendesk organization data based on email domains.

email.label: Email
email.helpText: Enter the admin email address for integration.

api_token.label: API Token
api_token.helpText: Provide the API token for authenticating requests.

installation_instructions: Follow the instructions in the README file to set up and use the app.
